headline: UBS: The Southern Company (SO) Is A Bottom-Ranked Quant Stock
summary: We recently made a list of UBS’ Bottom Quant Stocks In AI, IT, Healthcare & Others: 29 Stocks In All Sectors. In this piece, we will look at where The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) ranks on the list of UBS’ bottom quant stocks. With November 2024 having settled in and the US presidential election in its […]
